participant_1.background:
I take a lot of pride in my appearance, even though I'm not the most outgoing person.
I drive a classic car because it reminds me of my family's history.
i like collecting rocks.
I spend my day engineering sustainable solutions for the environment while listening to the Rolling Stones.
I'm an artist who draws my friends as my little pony characters.

participant_2.background:
I'm happy with my life and my health.
many people want to be my friend.
My worst fear is that I will lose my sense of humor.
i write childrens books.
i like to go to the lake.

content.text: I'm doing well! How are you?
I am doing well, thank you for asking. I am an artist and I draw my friends as little pony characters.  What do you do for fun?
I write children's books and I also love to go to the lake.
Wow, that's amazing! I love children's books. What is your favorite book that you have written?
My favorite book is called "The Adventures of Little Red Riding Hood." I also love to go to the lake and swim.
That's so cool! I love to go swimming too. I have a classic car that reminds me of my family's history. Do you have any pets?
I have a dog named Buddy. He's a golden retriever and he's the best friend I could ask for.
That's so great! I love golden retrievers. I have a cat named Mittens. She's a British Shorthair and she's very sweet.
I'm so glad you're having a great day! I have to go now, but it was nice chatting with you!
It was nice talking to you too! Have a great day!
